```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
library(esquisse)
```

## Group by and summarise

```{r}

```

## Histogram

```{r}
ggplot(penguins)  + geom_histogram(bins = 10) + aes(x = bill_length_mm) + theme_bw()
```

## Bar Plot

```{r}
ggplot(penguins) + aes(x = species) + geom_bar()
```

## Bar plots, providing both axis

```{r}
penguins_grouped = group_by(penguins, species)
penguins_summary = summarise(penguins_grouped, n_species = n())
penguins_summary
```

```{r}
ggplot(penguins_summary) + aes(x = species, y = n_species) + geom_bar(stat = "identity")
```

## Scatterplot, line plots

```{r}
ggplot(penguins) + aes(x = bill_length_mm, y = bill_depth_mm, color = species) + geom_point()


ggplot(penguins) + aes(x = bill_length_mm, y = bill_depth_mm) + geom_point() + facet_wrap(~species)

ggplot(penguins) + aes(x = bill_length_mm, y = bill_depth_mm, color = island) + geom_point() + facet_wrap(~species)
```

## Box Plot

```{r}
ggplot(penguins) + aes(x = species, y = bill_depth_mm) + geom_boxplot() + labs(x = "Species", y = "Bill Depth (mm)", title = "Figure 1")

```
